DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Intravenous Immunoglobulin IgPro10 Patients With Primary Immunodeficiencies ( PID )
DOC.criteria: Key Patients CVID ( Common Variable Immunodeficiency ) XLA ( Xlinked agammaglobulinemia ) : Participated Phase III clinical study intravenous IgPro10 ( study number ZLB03_002CR ) 3 4 weekly interval 12 month ( refer 'old ' subject ) OR Were ≥ 6 year age , stable intravenous immunoglobulin therapy ( 200800 mg IgG per kg body weight ) 3 4week interval least 6 month , AND interest participate Phase III clinical study subcutaneous IgPro20 ( study number ZLB04_009CR ) ( refer 'new ' subject ) Written informed consent Key Diagnosis epilepsia Insulin dependent diabetes Administration steroid ( daily ≥ 0.15 mg prednisone equivalent/kg/day ) immunosuppressive drug History cardiac insufficiency ( NYHA III/IV ) , cardiomyopathy , congestive heart failure , severe hypertension
